#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    getchar();
    while(t--)
    {
        /*char str[26];
        gets(str);*/
        string cppStr;
        getline(cin, cppStr);
        const char* str = cppStr.c_str();
        int len,i,j,p=0,q=0,r=0,s=0,k,l,m=0,n=0,b=0,v=0,e=1,g=1,u=1;
        int equal=0,univ,c=0,flag=0;
        double sum1=0,sum2=0,sum3=0,d=0,o=0,ans=1;
        len=strlen(str);
        long long s1,s2,s3;
        double result;
        //printf("%d\n",len);
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {

            if(str[i]=='+')
            { p=1; flag=1;
                j=i;m=i; continue;
            }
            if(str[i]=='-' && i!=0 && flag!=1)
            { q=1; c++; flag=1;
            j=i; n=i;continue;
            }
            if(str[i]=='/')
            { r=1; flag=1;
            j=i;b=i; continue;
            }
            if(str[i]=='*')
            { s=1; flag=1;
                j=i; v=i;continue;
            }
            if(str[i]==' ') continue;
            if(str[i]=='x')
            { d=i; continue;}
            if(str[i]== '=' )
                { equal=i; continue;}

        }
        o=j;
      // printf("%d\n",j);
        if(str[0]!='x')
        for(i=0;i<j;i++)
            {
                if(str[i]=='-')
                    { e=-1; continue; }
                if(str[i]==' ')
                    continue;
                else
                    if(str[i]=='x')
                {   sum1=0; break;}
                else {sum1=sum1*10 + (str[i]-'0'); }
            }
        if(m!=0)
            j=m+1;
        else if( n!=0)
            j=n+1;
            else if(b!=0)
                j=b+1;
            else j=v+1;
          //  printf("%d\n",j);
        if(str[j]!='x')
            for(k=j;k<equal;k++)
            {
                if(str[k]=='-')
                   {
                    g=-1; continue; }
                if(str[k]==' ')
                    continue;
                else
                    if(str[k]=='x')
                {   sum2=0; break;}
                else {sum2=sum2*10 + (str[k]-'0'); }
            }
           // printf("%f\n",sum2);
        j=equal+1;
        if(str[j]!='x')
            for(l=j;l<len;l++)
            {
                if(str[l]=='-')
                    {u=-1; continue; }
                if(str[l]==' ')
                    continue;
                    else
                    if(str[l]=='x')
                {   sum3=0; break;}
             else {sum3=sum3*10 +(str[l]-'0');}
            } s1=sum1; s2=sum2; s3=sum3;
              sum1=e*sum1; sum2=sum2*g; sum3=u*sum3;
              s1*=e; s2*=g; s3*=u;
              // printf("%lf %lf %lf\n ",sum1,sum2,sum3);
              // printf("%lld %lld %lld\n",s1,s2,s3);
       // printf("%d %d %d %d\n",p,q,r,s);
       if(d<equal)
        for(i=d;i>o;i--)
        {
            if(str[i]=='-')
            ans=-1;
        }
        if(d>equal)
            for(i=d;i>equal;i--)
            {
                if(str[i]=='-')
                    ans=-1;
            }
        if(d<o)
        {
            for(i=d;i>=0;i--)
                {
                if(str[i]=='-')
                    ans=-1;
            }
        }
        if(p==1)
        {
            if(sum1==0)
                result=(sum3-sum2);
            else if(sum2==0)
                result=(sum3-sum1);
            else result=(sum1+sum2);
        }
        if(q==1)
        {
            if(sum1==0)
                result=(sum3+sum2);
            else if(sum2==0)
                result=(sum1-sum3);
            else result=(sum1-sum2);
        }
        if(r==1)
        {
            if(sum1==0)
                result=(sum3*sum2);
            else if(sum2==0)
                result=(s1/((s3*1.0)));
            else result=(s1/(s2*1.0));
        }
        if(s==1)
        {
            if(sum1==0)
                result=((s3*1.0)/s2);
            else if(sum2==0)
                result=((s3*1.0)/s1);
            else result=(s1*s2);
        }
       result*=ans;
       //printf("%lf\n",result);
        if(result==-0.000000)
            printf("0.000000\n");
        else printf("%.8lf\n",result);
    }
    return 0;
}
